summary: The document is a declassified or partially redacted communication associated with the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992. It details a request for derogatory information about the Military Armament Corporation (MAC) in Marietta, Georgia, specifically concerning shipments of machine gun and pistol ammunition to U.S. Army Surplus Guns - Sand Ammunition. The document's 'SECRET' classification and references to specific codes and dates highlight its sensitive or classified nature.
key_findings: The document pertains to the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992.
It involves a request for derogatory information regarding the Military Armament Corporation (MAC) located in Marietta, Georgia.
Details shipments of machine gun and pistol ammunition to U.S. Army Surplus Guns - Sand Ammunition.
The document was classified as 'SECRET', underscoring its sensitive nature at the time of its creation.
keywords: President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992
U.S. Army Surplus Guns - Sand Ammunition
